text.name: text
text.description: Natural language text for quick adding task (e.g., "Buy milk @Grocery #shopping tomorrow"). It can include a due date in free form text, a project name starting with the "#" character (without spaces), a label starting with the "@" character, an assignee starting with the "+" character, a priority (e.g., p1), a deadline between "{}" (e.g. {in 3 days}), or a description starting from "//" until the end of the text.

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'section' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'comment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'reminder' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation IN ["delete", "close", "get", "reopen", "update", "move"] THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation IN ["create", "move"] THEN SHOW parameter 'project'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'move' THEN SHOW parameter 'section'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 2.1}} THEN HIDE parameter 'section'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'move' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 2.1}} THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'labels'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'quickAdd' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'quickAdd' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'task' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation IN ["archive", "delete", "get", "getCollaborators", "unarchive", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectOptions'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectUpdateFields'
IF resource == 'section' AND operation IN ["delete", "get", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'sectionId'
IF resource == 'section' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'sectionProject'
IF resource == 'section' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'sectionName'
IF resource == 'section' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'sectionOptions'
IF resource == 'section' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'sectionUpdateFields'
IF resource == 'section' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'sectionFilters'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation IN ["delete", "get", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'commentId'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentTaskId'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentContent'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentUpdateFields'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentFilters'
IF resource == 'label' AND operation IN ["delete", "get", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'labelId'
IF resource == 'label' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'labelName'
IF resource == 'label' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'labelOptions'
IF resource == 'label' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'labelUpdateFields'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation IN ["delete", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'reminderId'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'itemId'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'dueDateType'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' AND dueDateType == 'natural_language' THEN SHOW parameter 'natural_language_representation'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' AND dueDateType == 'full_day' THEN SHOW parameter 'date'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' AND dueDateType == 'floating_time' THEN SHOW parameter 'datetime'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' AND dueDateType == 'fixed_timezone' THEN SHOW parameter 'datetime'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' AND dueDateType == 'fixed_timezone' THEN SHOW parameter 'timezone'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'reminderOptions'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'reminderUpdateFields'
